S04n546:1: punaraparaṃ kuladevate rājñaḥ sureśvaraprabhasya viṣaye jalavāhanena śreṣṭhidārakeṇa sarvasattvā ārogāḥ kṛtā alpā bādhā yathāpūrveṇotsāhabalakāyena saṃvṛtāḥ sarva utsāhasukhena ramanti sma |
S04n546:6: jalavāhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako mahāvaidyadānānāṃ ca sukhānāṃ vyādhivicikitsako niyatapratyakṣeṇa bodhisattvena bhavitavyam |
S04n546:8: tasya khalu punaḥ jalavāhanasya śreṣṭhidārakasya jalāmbujagarbhā nāma bhāryā'bhūt |
S04n546:9: tasya khalu punaḥ kuladevate jalāmbujagarbhāyā dvau dārakau putrāvabhūtām |
S04n546:10: eko jalāmbaro nāma dvitīyo jalagarbho nāma ||
S04n546:11: atha khalu punaḥ kuladevate jalavāhanaḥ śreṣṭhiputrasyābhyāṃ dārakābhyāṃ sārdhamanupūrveṇa grāmanagaranigamajanapadarāṣṭrarājadhānīṣvanucaṅkramati ||
S04n546:12: atha khalu punaḥ kuladevate'pareṇa tena kālena tena samayena jalavāhanaḥ śreṣṭhiputro'nyataramaṭavīkāntāraprāpto'dhvani dadarśātrāntare māṃsabhakṣā vṛkaśṛgālakākapakṣiṇastāṃ diśaṃ dhāvanti yatrāṭavīkāntāre'ṭavīsaṃbhavā puṣkariṇī |
S04n546:14: kasyārthamime māṃsabhakṣā vṛkaśṛgālakākapakṣiṇa imāṃ diśaṃ dhāvanti |
S04n546:18: atha khalu punaḥ kuladevate jalavāhanaḥ śreṣṭhiputro'nupūrveṇānucaṅkramannanuvicaranyatrāṭavīsaṃbhavā puṣkariṇī tatra saṃprāptaḥ |
S04n546:20: sa tatrāpaśyadbahūni matsyaśatāni jalaviprahīṇāni tatrāsya kāruṇyacittamutpannam |
S04n546:23: sādhu sādhu kulaputra yastvaṃ jalavāhano nāma matsyānāmudakaṃ prayaccha |
S04n546:30: atha khalu kuladevate jalavāhanasya śreṣṭhidārakasya bhūyasyā mātrayā paramakāruṇyacittamutpannam |
S04n546:31: tena khalu punaḥ kuladevate samayenāṭavīsaṃbhavāyāṃ puṣkariṇyā kiṃcinmātramavaśiṣṭamudakamabhūt |
S04n546:33: atha khalu kuladevate jalavāhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaścaturdiśaṃ dhāvati sma |
S04n546:34: yasyāṃ diśi jalavāhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako'nucaṅkamati tasyāṃ diśi daśamtsyasahasrāṇi jalavāhanaṃ karuṇaṃ prekṣante ||
S04n546:35: atha khalu kuladevate jalavāhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaścaturdiśaṃ dhāvati sma |
S04n546:38: so'drākṣīnnātidūre mahāntaṃ vṛkṣasamūhaṃ taṃ vṛkṣamabhiruhya drumaśākhāñchittvā yena sā puṣkariṇī tenopajagāma |
S04n546:39: upagamya teṣāṃ daśānāṃ matsyasahasrāṇāṃ drumaśākhābhiḥ suśītalāñchāyāṃ kṛtavān ||
S04n546:40: atha khalu kuladevate jalavāhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakastasyāṃ puṣkariṇyāmudakāgamaṃ paryeṣate kuta udakasyāgamanaṃ bhavet |
S04n546:43: tasyāḥ khalu punaḥ kuladevate aṭavīsaṃbhavāyāḥ puṣkariṇyā jalāgamā nāma mahānadī yatastasyāmudakasyāgamanam |
S04n546:44: tena ca samayena sā ndyanyatareṇa pāpasattvena teṣāṃ daśānāṃ matsyasahasrāṇāmarthena sā nadītyadṛṣṭe sthāne mahāprapāte pātitā yatteṣāṃ matsyānāṃ na bhūya udakasyāgamanaṃ bhaviṣyati |
S04n546:45: sa taṃ dṛṣṭvā cintayati na śakyata eṣā nadī janasahasreṇāpi tenaiva yathā vāhayituṃ kimaṅga punarmayaikena śakyo bāhayituṃ sa pratinivṛttaḥ ||
S04n546:46: atha khalu kuladevate jalavāhanaḥ śreṣṭhiputraḥ śīghraṃ śīghramupasaṃkrānto yena rājā sureśvaprabhastenopajagāma |
S04n546:47: upagamya rājñaḥ sureśvaraprabhasya pādau śirasā natvaikānte niṣaṇṇaḥ |
S04n546:49: mayā khalu devasya viṣaye sarvagrāmanagaranigamajanapadarāṣṭrarājadhānīṣu sattvānāṃ vyādhayaḥ praśamitāḥ |
S04n546:52: taddadātu me devo viṃśatigajā yathā teṣāṃ tiryagyonigatānāṃ jīvitaṃ dadāmīti |
S04n546:53: yathā manuṣyāṇāṃ dattamājñaptaṃ khalu rājñā sureśvaraprabheṇāmātyānāṃ dadata mahāvaidyarājasya viṃśatigajān |
S04n546:55: upasaṃkrama mahāsattva yena hastiśālā upagṛhṇīṣva viṃśatigajān kuru sattvānāṃ sukham ||
S04n546:56: atha khalu kuladevate jalavāhanaḥ sārdhaṃ jalāmbareṇa ca svaputreṇa viṃśatigajān gṛhītvā nāgaśauṇḍikānāṃ sakāśācchataśo dṛśīnāṃ pratigṛhya pratinivṛttaḥ |
S04n546:58: tatropasaṃkramyodakena tā dṛtīḥ pūrayitvā gajapṛṣṭha udakamāropya śīghraṃ śīghraṃ yenāṭavīsaṃbhavā puṣkariṇī tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ |
S04n546:59: upasaṃkramya tadudakaṃ hastipṛṣṭhādavatārya tāṃ puṣkariṇīṃ caturdiśamudakena pūrayitvā caturdiśaṃ ca kramati |
S04n546:60: yena yena jalavāhano'nucaṅkramati tena tena daśamatsyasahasrāṇyanudhāvanti ||
S04n546:64: nūnamete matsyāḥ kṣudhāgninā paripīḍitā mama sakāśādbhojanaṃ parimārgayanti |
S04n546:66: atha khalu kuladevate jalavāhanaḥ svaputraṃ jalāmbarametadavocat |
S04n546:67: gaccha kulaputra svakaṃ niveśanaṃ sarvabalataraṃ hastinamabhirūhya ca śīdhraṃ śīghramupasaṃkramya pitāmahasya śreṣṭhina evaṃ vadeha bho tāta jalavāhana evaṃ vadati yatkiṃcidatra gṛhe'bhisaṃskṛtaṃ bhojanaṃ syānmātāpitrorbhrātṛbhaginyordāsīdāsakarmakarasya kṛtaśaḥ sarvamekatra piṇḍīkṛtvā jalāmbarasya hastipṛṣṭamavaropya jalavāhanāya śīghraṃ śīghraṃ visarjaya ||
S04n546:68: atha khalu jalāmbaro dārako hastinamabhiruhya śīghraṃ śīghraṃ dhāvati sma |
S04n546:69: yena svakaṃ niveśanaṃ tenopasaṃkrāmadupasaṃmyaitāṃ prakṛtaṃ pitāmahasyāgra ārocayāmāsa vistareṇa yathā pūrvoktam |
S04n546:71: atha khalu jalambaro dārakastadbhojanaṃ hastipṛṣṭhamupanāmya hastinamabhiruhya yenāṭavīsaṃbhavā puṣkariṇī tenopasaṃkrāmat ||
S04n546:72: atha khalu jalavāhanaḥ svakaṃ putraṃ jalāmbaramāgataṃ dṛṣṭvā hṛṣṭastuṣṭa udagraḥ putrasyāntikādbhojanaṃ pratigṛhya cchittvā tatra puṣkariṇyāṃ prakṣipati sma |
S04n546:75: śrutaṃ me pareṇa kālasamayenāraṇyāyatane bhikṣurmahāyānadhārayamāna ityāha |
S04n546:76: yo ratnaśikhinastathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya maraṇakālasamaye nāmadheyaṃ śṛṇuyāt |
S04n546:78: yannūnamahameṣāṃ matsyānāṃ gambhīraṃ pratītyasamutpādaṃ dharmaṃ deśayeyam |
S04n546:80: tena ca samayena tasmiñjambudvīpe dvighādṛṣṭiḥ sattvānāmabhūt |
S04n546:82: atha khalu punarjalavāhanaḥ śreṣṭhiputrastasyāṃ velāyāmubhau pādau jānumātraṃ tatra puṣkariṇyāṃ praveśyaivaṃ cidānamudānayāmāsa |
S04n546:83: namastasya bhagavato ratnaśikhinastathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya purvabodhisattvacaryāṃ caramāṇasya evaṃ praṇidhānamabhūt |
S04n546:84: ye keciddaśasu dikṣu maraṇakālasamaye mama nāmadheyaṃ śṛṇuyuste tataścyutvā devānāṃ trāyastriṃśānāṃ sabhāgatāyāmupapadyeyuḥ ||
S04n546:85: atha khalu jalavāhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakasteṣāṃ tiryagyonigatānāmimaṃ dharmaṃ deśayati sma |
S04n546:97: jātipratyayā jarāmaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsā bhavatyevamasya kevalasya mahato duḥkhaskandhasya samudayo bhavati yadutāvidyānirodhātsaṃrakāranirodhaḥ |
S04n546:109: iti hi kuladevate tena kālena tena samayena jalavāhanaḥ śreṣṭhiputrasteṣāṃ tiryagyonigatānāmimāṃ dhārmikakathāṃ kathayati sma |
S04n546:110: sārdhaṃ putrābhyāṃ jalāmbareṇa jalagarbheṇa ca punarapi svagṛhamanuprāptaḥ ||
S04n546:111: athāpareṇa kālena samayena jalavāhanaḥ śreṣṭhiputro mahotsavaṃ paribhujya mahotsavamatto śayane śayitaḥ |
S04n546:112: tena ca kālena tena samayena mahānimittaḥ prādurbhūtaḥ |
S04n546:113: yattasyā rātryāmatyayena tāni daśamatsyasahasrāṇi kālagatāni deveṣu trāyastriṃśatsu sabhāgatāyāmupapannāni |
S04n546:118: te vayaṃ tiryagyonigatā jalavāhanena śreṣṭhidārakeṇa prabhūtenodakena saṃtarpitā bhojanavareṇa ca |
S04n546:121: tena kuśaladharmahetunā tena pratyayeneha vayaṃ deveṣūpapannāḥ |
S04n546:124: atha tāni daśadevaputrasahasrāṇi deveṣu trāyastriṃśatsvantarhitāni jalavāhanasya śriṣṭhino gṛhe tasthuḥ |
S04n546:125: tena khalu punaḥ samayena ca jalavāhanaḥ śreṣṭyupaśayane śayitaḥ |
S04n546:135: te ca devaputrā rājñaḥ sureśvaraprabhasya viṣaye sthānasthānāntare māndāravapuṣpavarṣaṃ pravarṣayanto yenāṭavīsaṃbhavā puṣkariṇī tenopasaṃkrāntāḥ te tatra puṣkariṇyāṃ māndāravapuṣpaṃ pravarṣayantastata evāntarhitāḥ punarapi devālayaṃ gatāḥ |
S04n546:144: jalavāhanasya śreṣṭhidārakasya catvāriṃśanmuktāhārasahasrāṇi pravarṣitāni divyāni ca māndāravapuṣpāṇi nirgacchanti |
S04n546:146: bhavanto jalavāhanaṃ śreṣṭhinaṃ dārakaṃ priyavacanena śabdāpayan ||
S04n546:147: atha te gaṇakamahāmātyā yena jalavāhanasya gṛhaṃ tenopasaṃkrāntāḥ |
S04n546:150: atha jalavāhanaḥ śreṣṭhī mahāmātyaiḥ sārdhaṃ yena rājā sureśvaraprabhastenopajagāma |
S04n546:153: jalavāhana kiṃ nimittaṃ jānīyā yadadya rātrāvīdṛśāni śubhanimittāni prādurbhūtāni |
S04n546:160: kiṃ tāni daśamtsyasahasrāṇi jīvanti atha kālagatāni |
S04n546:164: kiṃ tāni daśamatsyasahasrāṇi jivanti atha kālagatāni |
S04n546:165: atha jalāmbaro dārakaḥ śīghraṃ śīghraṃ yenāṭavīsaṃbhavā puṣkariṇī tenopajagāma |
S04n546:167: tāni daśamtsyasahasrāṇi kālagatāni mahāntaṃ ca māndāravapuṣpavarṣaṃ dṛṣṭvā punarapi nivṛttaḥ pituretadavocat |
S04n546:169: atha jalavāhanaḥ śreṣṭhī dārako jalambarasya dārakasyāntikādidaṃ vacanaṃ śrutvā yena rājā sureśvaraprabhastenopasaṃkramyaitāṃ prakṛtimārocayati sma |
S04n546:170: yatkhalu devo jānīyāttāni daśamtsyasahasrāṇi sarvāṇi kālagatāni deveṣu trāyastriṃśatsvupapannāni |
S04n546:172: yadasmākaṃ gṛhe catvāriṃśanmuktāhārasahasrāṇi divyāni ca māndāravapuṣpāṇi pravarṣitāni |
S04n546:173: atha sa rājā hṛṣṭastuṣṭa udagrāttamanā babhūva ||
S04n546:175: syātkhalu punaryuṣmākaṃ kuladevate'nyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena sureśvaraprabho nāma rājā babhūva |
S04n546:178: daṇḍapāṇiḥ śākyastena kālena tena samayena sureśvaraprabho nāma rājā babhūva |
S04n546:179: syātkhalu punaḥ kuladevate'nyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena jaṭiṃdharo nāma śreṣṭhī babhūva |
S04n546:182: rājā śuddhodanaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena jaṭiṃdharo nāma śreṣṭhyabhūt ||
S04n546:183: syātkhalu punaste kuladevate'nyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena jalavāhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako'bhūt |
S04n546:186: ahaṃ sa tena kālena tena samayena jalavāhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako'bhūt ||
S04n546:187: syātkhalu punaste kuladevate'nyā sā tena kālena tena samayena jalavāhanasya jalāmbujagarbhā nāma bhāryābhūt |
S04n546:190: gopā nāma śākyakanyā tena kālena samayena jalavāhanasya jalāmbujagarbhā nāma bhāryābhūt |
S04n546:191: rāhulabhadrastena kalena tena samayena jalāmbaro nāma dārako'bhūt |
S04n546:192: ānandaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena jalagarbho nāma dārako'bhūt |
S04n546:193: syātkhalu punaste kuladevate'nyāni tāni tena kālena tena samayena daśamatsyasahasrāṇi babhūvaḥ |
S04n546:196: amūni tāni jvalanāntaratejorājapramukhāni daśadevaputrasahasrāṇi tena kālena tena samayena daśamatsyasahasrāṇi babhūvuḥ |
S04n546:198: bhojanavareṇa ca gambhīraśca pratītyasamutpādo dharmo deśitaḥ |
S04n546:200: tena kuśaladharmahetunā mamāntika ihāgatāni yenaitarhyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau vyākṛtāni |
S04n546:202: syātkhalu punaste kuladevate'nyā sā tena kālena tena samayena vṛkṣadevatābhūt |
S04n546:205: tvamabhūḥ kuladevate tena kālena tena samayena vṛkṣadevatā |
S04n546:207: yathā mayā saṃsāre saṃsaratā bahavaḥ sattvāḥ paripācitā bodhau |
S04n546:208: ye te sarve vyākaraṇabhūmiṃ pratilapsyante'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhāviti ||
